authorLine.description:
For example:
  - Ian T Baldwin
  - Randy Schekman, Mark Patterson
  - Lee R Berger et al

statusDate.description: Date/time the `status` changed to this value (eg article moved from PoA to VoR).

preferred.title: Preferred name
preferred.description:
This is generally the name that is used by the person for English-language publications.

For example:
  - Randy Schekman
  - K. VijayRaghavan
  - Li Wenhui

index.title: Index name
index.description:
This is the name that should be used for indexing people.

For example:
  - Schekman, Randy
  - VijayRaghavan, Krishnaswamy
  - Li Wenhui

items.title: Phone number
items.description:
Phone number in E.164 format.

For example:
  - +447700900415
  - +12025550182;ext=555
